release.action: Use URL instead of URI in WSDL reader.
Move unpublic API into a private part.
Optimize the base URI management (no unecessary convertion from URI to String and from String to URI)
Use the complete and original parent URI to resolve imports and includes
Refactor the entire project, use JAX-B technology to marshall/unmarshall from XML to Java classes
Remove some utility classes. Some are moved to the petals-kernel project
Change the package names to org.ow2.petals instead of org.objectweb.petals
Fix the generation of SU document from JBI descriptor objects
Don't create empty Extensions object when parsing JBI descriptor
Add the extension petals:properties-file needed to merge from branch petals-bc-soap-2.x: add external extensions configuration capability, jbi extensions can reference external properties file.
Setters should be "public" instead of protected.
Add XML printing of the JBI descriptor.
